name: Spiritual Resonate
description:
This is our homework - make a game which theme is "Harmony".

My team number has Heino, Mike and Even.

This game is related to the rhythm. Player can input the order to release skills to battle, and the skills can be combined! If you release a fireball and your partner release the wind, you will get a bigger fireball and it can causes higher damage to enemy.

if you have any question or suggestion, you can comment. I am willing to receive the feedback about our game.

Thank you very much!
